help-file.title: ALCHEMIST
help-file.content:
Alchemists are a class that can make things out of seemingly mundane materials. They have the ability to craft items of all types including body armor, rings, bracelets, etc. They also have the ability to forge weapons. In addition to crafting and forging they can mix potions and throw them at their enemies and at higher levels they are said to be capable of creating scrolls and the ability to magically enhance items.
Allowable races: Human, Gnome, Goblin, Orc. Equipment usage: Like all classes on Duris, alchemists have their own specific item restrictions. They are restricted in their use of weapons, mainly using maces, clubs and staves. Some exceptions are allowed, however. They can wear almost any type of armor, but are mildly restricted in the use of miscellaneous magical items.
